data.name: Base Commander
data.detailed_description:
Base Commander is a 5v5 MOBA where teams compete to gain control of the map by capturing Bases. Each Base comes with a bonus awarded to the team that owns it, improving their conquest chances. But be on guard, because the enemy team can steal bases, and thieves never pay for what they take. Through strategy, team coordination, proper planning, and flat out skill, you and your cadre can strive to be come the ultimate Base Commanders.


Base Commander will feature dozens of unique characters, all with their own set of abilities and playstyles. Though we are in early stages of development still, we will be sharing each character in production as we get closer to launch!

We're currently working on Braxen - The Fire Filled Pirate Boy





As we work on the characters, we're also working on adding in more bases, polishing the game, and playtesting to make sure everything goes smoothly. We can't wait to update you as we go!

data.short_description: A 5v5 MOBA where players try to outplay the opposing team in a battle for control of bases on the map.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 3.8GHz / AMD FX-4350 4.2 GHz Quad-Core Processor.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640 / Radeon HD 7730
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
